Jacob is a wandering teacher of mathematics and computing.  He received his PhD in Mathematics Education from Columbia University's Teachers College under the direction of the late Dr. Bruce Vogelli. He is a career educator, and has interests in technology and curriculum development, and his research is in the history of mathematics, its curriculum, and pedagogy.  


At present, he is teaching such things at The New School and New York University in Manhattan, New York City.
